name: KRD Entertainment

overview: KRD Entertainment is the leader in direct marketing that located in Houston, TX. We are partnered with some of Houston’s top sports & entertainment clients. KRDEntertainment uses its brand ambassadors to present its clients to the public, by designing and executing specialized promotional marketing ad campaigns. KRD Entertainment focus is to connect our clients to customers, businesses, and the greater community. With our drive and the ability to create new foot traffic for our clients we have found ourselves in the unique position in today’s economy. We must grow! With most businesses downsizing these days, that makes use very proud.
